languages.text: {n}Глядя на вас расфокусированным взглядом, Идира слабо улыбается, будто бы вспоминая как именно мышцы должны складываться в нужное выражение лица.{/n} "Благодарим... благодарю? Вас, Лорд-капитан. Мне... нам лучше. Но нужно время. Давайте покинем это место. Найдите меня на корабле, я думаю, мы с ними уже немного освоимся к тому моменту".

{n}Idira looks at you with unfocused eyes and smiles weakly, as if trying to remember how to use her muscles to form a facial expression.{/n} "We thank... I thank? You, Lord Captain. I... we feel better. But it will take time. Let's leave. Find me on the ship later, I think me and them will be better acquainted by then."
languages.original_text: {n}Глядя на вас расфокусированным взглядом, Идира слабо улыбается, будто бы вспоминая как именно мышцы должны складываться в нужное выражение лица.{/n} "Благодарим... благодарю? Вас, Лорд-капитан. Мне... нам лучше. Но нужно время. Давайте покинем это место. Найдите меня на корабле, я думаю, мы с ними уже немного освоимся к тому моменту".

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira looks at you with unfocused eyes and smiles weakly, as if trying to remember how to use her muscles to form a facial expression.{/n} "We thank... I thank? You, Lord Captain. I... we feel better. But it will take time. Let's leave. Find me on the ship later, I think me and them will be better acquainted by then."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉用失焦的目光看着你，露出了虚弱的微笑，仿佛在努力回忆如何通过面部肌肉来做出表情一样。{/n}“我们感谢你……我感谢你？谢谢你，舰长大人。我……我们感觉好多了，不过得花些时间才能适应。咱们先走吧，之后在船上见个面吧。我觉得到了那个时候，我和它们应该就更熟悉些了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira looks at you with unfocused eyes and smiles weakly, as if trying to remember how to use her muscles to form a facial expression.{/n} "We thank... I thank? You, Lord Captain. I... we feel better. But it will take time. Let's leave. Find me on the ship later, I think me and them will be better acquainted by then."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉用失焦的目光看着你，露出了虚弱的微笑，仿佛在努力回忆如何通过面部肌肉来做出表情一样。{/n}“我们感谢你……我感谢你？谢谢你，舰长大人。我……我们感觉好多了，不过得花些时间才能适应。咱们先走吧，之后在船上见个面吧。我觉得到了那个时候，我和它们应该就更熟悉些了。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira te mira con ojos desenfocados y sonríe débilmente, como si intentara recordar cómo mover los músculos para formar una expresión facial.{/n} «Te damos... ¿Doy? Las gracias, Lord Capitán. Me... nos sentimos mejor. Pero esto llevará tiempo. Vámonos. Ve a buscarme más tarde en la nave; creo que para entonces nos conoceremos mejor».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira looks at you with unfocused eyes and smiles weakly, as if trying to remember how to use her muscles to form a facial expression.{/n} "We thank... I thank? You, Lord Captain. I... we feel better. But it will take time. Let's leave. Find me on the ship later, I think me and them will be better acquainted by then."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira te mira con ojos desenfocados y sonríe débilmente, como si intentara recordar cómo mover los músculos para formar una expresión facial.{/n} «Te damos... ¿Doy? Las gracias, Lord Capitán. Me... nos sentimos mejor. Pero esto llevará tiempo. Vámonos. Ve a buscarme más tarde en la nave; creo que para entonces nos conoceremos mejor».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira blickt dich mit glasigen Augen an und lächelt schwach, als würde sie sich zu erinnern versuchen, wie sie mit ihren Muskeln einen Gesichtsausdruck aufsetzen kann.{/n} "Wir danken ... Ich danke? Euch, Lord Captain. Ich ... wir fühlen uns besser. Aber es wird dauern. Gehen wir. Kommt später auf dem Schiff zu mir. Ich glaube, bis dahin habe ich sie schon besser kennengelernt."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira looks at you with unfocused eyes and smiles weakly, as if trying to remember how to use her muscles to form a facial expression.{/n} "We thank... I thank? You, Lord Captain. I... we feel better. But it will take time. Let's leave. Find me on the ship later, I think me and them will be better acquainted by then."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira blickt dich mit glasigen Augen an und lächelt schwach, als würde sie sich zu erinnern versuchen, wie sie mit ihren Muskeln einen Gesichtsausdruck aufsetzen kann.{/n} "Wir danken ... Ich danke? Euch, Lord Captain. Ich ... wir fühlen uns besser. Aber es wird dauern. Gehen wir. Kommt später auf dem Schiff zu mir. Ich glaube, bis dahin habe ich sie schon besser kennengelernt."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}イディラは焦点の定まらない目であなたを見ると、表情を作るための筋肉の使い方を思い出そうとしているかのように、弱々しく微笑んだ。{/n}「あたいたちは…ううん、あたい自身が感謝しているの、ロード・キャプテン。あたいは…あたいたちの気分は良くなったわ。だけど時間がかかる。さあ、行こう。あとで船で合流するまでに、彼らともっと親しくなれていると思う」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira looks at you with unfocused eyes and smiles weakly, as if trying to remember how to use her muscles to form a facial expression.{/n} "We thank... I thank? You, Lord Captain. I... we feel better. But it will take time. Let's leave. Find me on the ship later, I think me and them will be better acquainted by then."

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラは焦点の定まらない目であなたを見ると、表情を作るための筋肉の使い方を思い出そうとしているかのように、弱々しく微笑んだ。{/n}「あたいたちは…ううん、あたい自身が感謝しているの、ロード・キャプテン。あたいは…あたいたちの気分は良くなったわ。だけど時間がかかる。さあ、行こう。あとで船で合流するまでに、彼らともっと親しくなれていると思う」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira vous regarde d'un air perdu en souriant faiblement, comme si elle tentait de se rappeler comment utiliser ses muscles pour composer une expression faciale.{/n} « Nous vous remercions... Non, JE vous remercie. Enfin, merci, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je... nous nous sentons mieux. Mais cela prendra du temps. Partons. Revenez me voir plus tard, à bord du vaisseau. Je pense qu'eux et moi nous connaîtrons alors un peu mieux. »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira looks at you with unfocused eyes and smiles weakly, as if trying to remember how to use her muscles to form a facial expression.{/n} "We thank... I thank? You, Lord Captain. I... we feel better. But it will take time. Let's leave. Find me on the ship later, I think me and them will be better acquainted by then."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira vous regarde d'un air perdu en souriant faiblement, comme si elle tentait de se rappeler comment utiliser ses muscles pour composer une expression faciale.{/n} « Nous vous remercions... Non, JE vous remercie. Enfin, merci, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je... nous nous sentons mieux. Mais cela prendra du temps. Partons. Revenez me voir plus tard, à bord du vaisseau. Je pense qu'eux et moi nous connaîtrons alors un peu mieux. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Belli belirsiz sana bakan İdira, sanki yüz ifadelerini yapmasını sağlayan kasları nasıl kullanacağını hatırlamaya çalışırmış gibi hafifçe gülümsüyor.{/n} "Biz... Ben... Teşekkür ederim Lord Kaptan. Ben... Biz daha iyiyiz. Zamana ihtiyacım var. Gidelim artık. Gemide görüşürüz, o zamana onlarla daha iyi anlaşıyor olurum."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira looks at you with unfocused eyes and smiles weakly, as if trying to remember how to use her muscles to form a facial expression.{/n} "We thank... I thank? You, Lord Captain. I... we feel better. But it will take time. Let's leave. Find me on the ship later, I think me and them will be better acquainted by then."

traits.locale_text: {n}İdira, sanki yüz ifadelerini yapmasını sağlayan kasları nasıl kullanacağını hatırlamaya çalışırcasına belli belirsiz sana doğru bakarak hafifçe gülümsüyor.{/n} "Ben... Biz... Teşekkür ederiz Lord Kaptan. Ben... Biz daha iyiyiz. Zamana ihtiyacım var. Gidelim artık. Gemide görüşürüz, sanırım o zaman onlarla daha iyi anlaşıyor olurum."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
